page.title: 16Lee Mill Plympton St.Mary.
page.content: Until recently this small hamlet was on the old A.38.The new road has relieved traffic going through the village. The main road is made up of{terraced {houses and semi-detached cottages which were built at the turn of the century.It has two{pubs,}one{General {store}and{Post-Office.}The dominating aspect is the{Horticultural Machinery manufacturers HARRIS of DEVON. A recently built small development of {bungalows}has been added to the existing{council houses. At the west end of the hamlet is a sales office and workshop for a {refrigeration and air-conditioning firm.There is also a garage which buys and sells{motor caravans.
